product.name: ONE-S AIR SUIT
product.description:
ONE-S AIR SUIT
Designed for highest lightness and ease of customization, the ONE-S AIR Suit features an ultralightweight, breathable fabric and simplified cut. It’s ideal for teams seeking branding flexibility without sacrificing fit or comfort.

• OMP Air technology
• FIA 8856-2018 (SFI upon request)
• 10% more breathable and 18% lighter than previous ONE-S
• Minimal cut design studied to optimize customization
• Pre-shaped sleeves to improve ergonomic fit
• Elastic inserts on back,crotch and armhole
• Soft hand feel with optional black inner lining
• Extremely refined finish with differentiated threads and minimal cuffs
• Shaped collar
• Extraction handles
• Ultraflat seams
• Premium metal zip
• Hidden outer pocket
• OMP branded velcro at collar closure
Built to improve driver's focus through increased freedom of movement and reduced thermal load.

Colors :Black/White/Silver (171), Silver/Black (189), Navy blue/Fluo orange (249), Red/White (063), Black/Teal (379)
Sizes :46÷64
